forecastday.fcttext: Plentiful sunshine. High 54F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High around 50F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 48F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 58F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.
